title: Remove 'Made with caffeine.ai' footer attribution

requirements.text: In frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx, remove the 'Made with caffeine.ai' attribution text from the footer. The footer may retain other content (e.g., copyright line) but must not display any caffeine.ai branding or attribution.

quotes: Remove made with caffeine.ai at bottom of website

acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Made with caffeine.ai' (or any variation such as 'Powered by caffeine.ai') is no longer visible anywhere on the page footer.
No other footer content is unintentionally removed.
The layout remains visually intact with no broken spacing or empty footer artifacts.

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Do not remove other footer elements unrelated to the caffeine.ai attribution.
